Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Documentary papyrus
Description: Four people, of whom no information as to their personal details is given, writing in certain Apollonios in connection with the embarkation of a shipment of stone (from a quarry no doubt). It deals with the construction of a peristyle and of drums of columns. The letter is located within a context of stone extraction and architectural creation.
